name: Gloppy The Slime
description:
#newbiesgamejam2

Gloppy The Slime is a puzzle platformer in which you need to solve puzzles to complete the levels.

Controls:

You can use WASD to move and E to create a dead slime. You'll need to strategically use these dead slimes to complete the level. You can use the dead slimes to reach high platforms and also to press buttons. To reload the level press R.
